# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

add_definitions(-DIMP_SWIG_WRAPPER)

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${MODELLER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${MODELLER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

GET_DIRECTORY_PROPERTY(includes INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES)
foreach(include ${includes})
set(include_path ${include_path}:${include})
endforeach(include)

# SWIG doesn't need Python.h in its own include path
include_directories(${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIRS})

set(swig_path ${IMP_SWIG_PATH})

# this is needed for some reason that I don't understand
set(swigpath ${ANN_SWIG_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_SWIG_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_SWIG_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_SWIG_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_SWIG_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_SWIG_PATH}
        ${CGAL_SWIG_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_SWIG_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_SWIG_PATH}
        ${MODELLER_SWIG_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_SWIG_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_SWIG_PATH})
foreach(swig ${swigpath})
set(swig_path ${swig}:${swig_path})
endforeach(swig)

file(STRINGS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/modeller_swig.deps" swigdeps)

set(source ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/modeller_swig/wrap.cpp
                          ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/modeller_swig/wrap.h)

add_custom_command(OUTPUT ${source}
                          "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib/IMP/modeller/__init__.py"
   COMMAND "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/make_swig_wrapper.py"
            "--swig=${SWIG_EXECUTABLE}"
            "--swigpath=${swig_path}"
            "--includepath=${include_path}"
            "--module=modeller"
   DEPENDS ${swigdeps} ${IMP_MODELLER_PYTHON_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES}
   WORKING_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
   COMMENT "Running swig on modeller")

add_library(_IMP_modeller MODULE ${source})

set_target_properties(_IMP_modeller PROPERTIES PREFIX "")

if(WIN32 AND NOT CYGWIN)
  set_target_properties(_IMP_modeller PROPERTIES SUFFIX ".pyd")
endif()

target_link_libraries(_IMP_modeller
    imp_modeller
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY} ${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
    ${MODELLER_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES}
    ${IMP_SWIG_LIBRARIES}
  )

add_custom_target("imp_modeller_python" ALL DEPENDS ${source} _IMP_modeller
)

INSTALL(TARGETS _IMP_modeller DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PYTHONDIR})
